# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I propose a price of $100 for it. This price reflects not only its worth but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire something of high value at a reasonable premium. I'm confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer
